review: It works, but all it's useful for is to display wallpaper on my TV. It doesn't work with Amazon Prime and it can't be controlled from an iPhone or iPad because the Chrome browser on these devices doesn't support Chromecast. Consequently, you have to jump through hoops to stream videos such as PBS Video to your TV.
author: alphazetaomega

review: I was disappointed to learn upon receipt that it does NOT support Amazon streaming.  Silly me - thinking Amazon would promote a product it did not play with.  As a result, it's basically useless to me personally, although I think it is a good product for users who don't care about Amazon streaming.
